"Tap the 'Bilibili' app icon to open the application and view the recommended videos on the homepage."
"Click the '热门' tab to view the most popular videos and content."
"Scroll right to switch from the '热门' (Hot) tab to the '动漫' (Anime) tab, displaying anime content options such as '牧神记' and '少女乐队的响咚'."
"Click the '动画' tab to view the animation content section."
Scroll down to view more recommended animation content.
Scroll down to view more details and options for the "猫和老鼠 旧版" (Tom and Jerry Classic) series, including episodes, ratings, and additional content.
"Click the star icon to open the 'Choose Collection' folder selection dialog."
"Click the '重新加载' (Reload) button to attempt reloading the content."
